structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.catch_line: Role of council with respect to program created by KRS 158.798.
law.history: Amended 1997 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 75, effective May 30, 1997. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 408, sec. 3, effective July 14, 1992.
